item.title: Using CVS as source control for Sybase PowerBuilder
item.description: This article in short describes, how to use CVS for Powerbuilder. This solution we are using for about 6 years and it works very good. PBL problems The main difficulty of the Sybase Power Builder is in PBL libraries. PBL libraries are binary libraries containing both - sources and precompiled sources. This solution causes many problems: PBLs are also very inclinable to faults (in Power Builder 7 it was not very surprissing that after fullrebuild failure were PBLs completely broken).
